name: Virvo
overview:
Virvo provide web development and design services to startups and small businesses - specialising PHP and Ruby development services.

The company was established in early 2008 to provide services for businesses in and around the London area. Their main focus since launch has been to provide application development services to smaller companies - a crowded niche.

Their main streams of income currently include:

  • PHP web development
  • Ruby on Rails applicaiton development
  • Ecommerce provision to startups
  • Server maintenace for established companies
